title: [Large-Scale] Language Analysis Competency Development Course Through Web-Based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online collaboration tool usage and foundational language analysis skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on inquiry activities using work-related language materials for working professionals.

learning_goals: Analyze patterns and formulate hypotheses from real-world workplace language data using web-based tools
Produce presentation materials demonstrating findings from sociolinguistic context investigations through small-group collaboration
Structure persuasive arguments based on digital-collected linguistic evidence
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
